auth.welcomeSubtitle: Track your gaming progress and compete with friends

onboarding.setPseudoSubtitle: This will be visible to other players

groups.title: Groups
groups.noGroupsSubtitle: Create your first group or join one with an invitation code
groups.alreadyInGroup: You are already a member of this group
groups.adminNotPremiumMessage: This group's admin has a free plan and cannot accept new members. The group is at its member limit.
groups.groupLimitMessage: Free users can create or join up to 2 groups. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited groups.
groups.upgradeBannerSubtitle: Create unlimited groups and access all premium features

groupDetails.title: Group Details
groupDetails.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
groupDetails.needAtLeastTwoPlayers: You need at least 2 players to create a game
groupDetails.groupNotAccessible: This group doesn't exist or you don't have access to it
groupDetails.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
groupDetails.deleteGroupWarning: This action cannot be undone. The group will be marked as deleted but can be recovered if needed.

memberManagement.title: Manage Members
memberManagement.noMembersSubtitle: There are no members in this group yet
memberManagement.noRealUsersSubtitle: There are no real users in this group yet
memberManagement.chooseUserToMerge: Choose a user to merge with a virtual member
memberManagement.noVirtualUsers: No virtual members available to merge
memberManagement.canOnlyMergeVirtual: Only virtual members can be merged. {{name}} is a real user account.
memberManagement.confirmMergeMessage:
Are you sure you want to merge {{virtualName}} (ELO: {{virtualElo}}) with {{realName}} (ELO: {{realElo}})?

This action is not reversible and the current {{realName}} data will be lost.

profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutMessage:
Version 1.0.0

EloHero is a community ELO ranking application that allows groups of players to track their performance and create dynamic rankings based on their games.
profile.supportMessage: For any questions or problems, join our Discord community for help and support.
profile.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
profile.disconnectMessage: This will sign you out and return to the login screen.

matchEntry.title: New Match
matchEntry.instructions: Select players and order them according to their final ranking. Drag and drop to reorganize the order.
matchEntry.confirmMatchMessage: Are you sure you want to record this match with {{count}} players?
matchEntry.needAtLeastTwoPlayers: You need at least 2 players to create a match
matchEntry.needAtLeastTwoTeams: You need at least 2 teams to create a match
matchEntry.teamMustHaveAtLeastOneMember: Each team must have at least one member
matchEntry.confirmMatchMessageTeams: Are you sure you want to record this match with {{count}} teams?

addMemberModal.title: Add New Member
addMemberModal.memberLimitReachedMessage: Free users can add up to 5 members. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited members.

teamModePremium.title: Unlock Team Mode
teamModePremium.subtitle: Create squad-based matches, compare team rankings instantly, and keep your rankings fair for every lineup.
teamModePremium.bullet1: Build unlimited teams with custom lineups
teamModePremium.bullet2: Track team ranking changes and predictions

memberLimitPremium.title: Unlock Unlimited Members
memberLimitPremium.subtitle: Free users can add up to 5 members per group. Upgrade to Premium to add unlimited members and grow your community.
memberLimitPremium.bullet1: Add unlimited members to your groups
memberLimitPremium.bullet2: Build larger communities and compete with more players

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.unlimitedGroupsDesc: Create and join as many groups as you want
subscription.unlimitedMembersDesc: Add as many players as needed
subscription.teamMatchesDesc: Create squad-based matches with live ranking projections
subscription.upgradeAlertMessage: Subscription feature will be available soon. Contact us for more information.
subscription.manageAlertMessage: Subscription management will be available soon.
subscription.purchaseSuccess: Your subscription has been activated successfully!
subscription.purchaseFailed: Failed to purchase subscription. Please try again.
subscription.restoreSuccess: Your previous purchases have been restored!
subscription.restoreFailed: No previous purchases found or restore failed.

subscriptionDebug.title: Subscription Debug
subscriptionDebug.configNote: In RevenueCat Dashboard: Go to Products → Select your product → Link it to the 'premium' entitlement
subscriptionDebug.noActiveEntitlementsSubtext: Your product needs to be linked to the 'premium' entitlement in RevenueCat Dashboard

playerProfile.title: Player Profile
playerProfile.noDataInGroup: This player has no data in this group yet
playerProfile.noHistorySubtext: Your rating changes will appear here
playerProfile.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this player from the group?
playerProfile.removeWarning: Warning: The player's rating will be lost, but their match history will be preserved.

matchDetails.title: Match Details
matchDetails.noParticipants: No participants found for this match
matchDetails.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this match?
matchDetails.deleteWarning: This will reverse all rating changes for each player and remove the match from the group. This action cannot be undone.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
